StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetPerson]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonID as integer AS
SELECT LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SUFFIX_CD, SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER ,DATE_OF_BIRTH, GENDER_CODE ,ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID, RECRUITER_OF_RECORD_ID FROM PERSON, MARINE_CANDIDATE ,NWA WHERE PERSON_ID = @PersonID AND MARINE_CANDIDATE.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = PERSON.PERSON_ID AND NWA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MARINE_CANDIDATE.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID
